```{r}
source("Rscripts/utils.R")
peaks <- my_read_bed(cmd = "bgzip -cd -@ 16 Tables/All-DSG-peaks.tsv.gz")
```


```{r}
peaks %>%
    group_by(is_SD) %>%
    summarise(
        total_n = n(),
        shared = sum(haplotype_distinct == "Shared"),
        distinct = sum(haplotype_distinct != "Shared"),
        epi_distinct = sum(haplotype_distinct == "Epigenetically haplotype-selective"),
        frac_epi_distinct = epi_distinct / distinct,
    )
```
